main event: On February 24, 1959, American Airlines flight crew and other witnesses reported seeing unidentified flying objects near Bradford, Pennsylvania.
interesting points: The objects were described as three bright lights in a horizontal line and changed intensity from dim to bright,The sighting lasted approximately 40 minutes during which light formations were observed moving in an unusual manner,At one point, the captain of the flight thought the lights resembled the stars in the constellation Orion but dismissed this after observing their behavior,Two other United Airlines pilots confirmed they had similar sightings in the area at the same time,The Air Force later suggested the lights were part of a military refueling operation, but witnesses believed they were observing something more unusual.
sighted object: three bright lights in the sky
witness description: The witnesses included the flight crew of an American Airlines plane, other passengers, and crew from United Airlines and several individuals on the ground in the vicinity.
